name: CrypGPT
description: CrypGPT (CGPT) is an AI-driven cryptocurrency ecosystem designed to empower traders, investors, and communities. It integrates blockchain with advanced AI to deliver: • AI Trading Tools & Bots: Automated trading signals and portfolio management. • Fraud & Scam Detection: AI modules for security and trust. • Crypto Payment Gateway: Simple, global, decentralized payment solutions. • Compliance & Transparency: KYC/AML tools, audits, and secure smart contracts. • Community Growth: Staking, rewards, and an incentivized ecosystem. With a focus on AI + Web3 synergy, CrypGPT brings accessibility, efficiency, and security to crypto users worldwide.
